alert.note: Alert for Greensville; Sussex (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 12:20AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Greensville and southwestern Sussex Counties and the City of Emporia through 1245 AM EDT... At 1220 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Emporia, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Jarratt around 1230 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Owens, Gray, Grizzard, Mason, Yale, Durand, Slagles Lake, Cowie Corner and Hilda. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM EDT for southeastern Virginia.
